allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add project documentation and CLAUDE.md

- Add comprehensive architecture documentation in /docs:
  - OVERVIEW.md: System architecture, tech stack, core entities
  - PRD.md: Product requirements, features, user stories
  - API-DESIGN.md: RESTful API endpoints and contracts
  - DATABASE-SCHEMA.md: PostgreSQL schema with RLS policies
  - EXTENSION-ARCHITECTURE.md: Chrome extension \(WXT/React\) design
  - WEB-DASHBOARD-ARCHITECTURE.md: Next.js 14 App Router structure
  - DEPLOYMENT.md: Vercel, Railway, Supabase, Chrome Web Store setup

- Add CLAUDE.md for Claude Code with:
  - Project overview and tech stack summary
  - Development commands for all components
  - Key architecture patterns and data models
  - Environment variable reference

- Create placeholder READMEs for backend, frontend, and extension

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update architecture for Python backend and align with PRD

Architecture changes:
- Rewrite backend stack from Node.js/Hono to Python/FastAPI
- Add 3-Layer Feature Stack architecture \(L1 Core → L2 AI-Assisted → L3 AI Magic\)
- Add Swiss Army Knife philosophy with graceful degradation patterns
- Add Element Picker \(FR48-53\) and Answer Generator \(FR54-59\) patterns
- Update FR count from 47 to 59 requirements
- Add Component Distribution Matrix
- Update storage strategy to Cloud-First + Local Cache
- Defer BYOK support to Phase 2

PRD changes:
- Add missing extension permissions: scripting, alarms

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete UX Design workflow with 3-layer architecture alignment

- Add brainstorming session analysis \(feature integration, MVP-10 definition\)
- Complete UX Design Specification \(14 steps\):
  - User journey flows with Mermaid diagrams
  - Component strategy \(8 custom components\)
  - UX consistency patterns \(buttons, feedback, loading, modals\)
  - Responsive design & accessibility \(WCAG 2.1 AA\)
- Update design directions with Party Mode improvements
- Key decisions: Swiss Army Knife philosophy, Shadow DOM isolation,
  44px touch targets, multi-modal match score communication

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/enigma/Documents/Projects/job-jet add .github/workflows/ci.yml .gitignore .prettierrc eslint.config.js package.json pnpm-lock.yaml pnpm-workspace.yaml tsconfig.base.json apps/extension apps/backend packages/types project-context.md _bmad-output/implementation-artifacts/1-1-project-scaffolding-monorepo-setup.md _bmad-output/implementation-artifacts/sprint-status.yaml)

Bash(git -C /Users/enigma/Documents/Projects/job-jet commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Story 1.1: Project scaffolding & monorepo setup

Complete monorepo scaffolding with pnpm workspaces including:
- WXT Chrome extension with React 19, Tailwind CSS 4, Zustand
- Python FastAPI backend with Pydantic Settings, health endpoint
- Shared @job-jet/types package with API response types
- GitHub Actions CI for extension, types, and backend

Code review fixes applied:
- Updated project-context.md to reflect Python/FastAPI stack
- Fixed types tsconfig.json build \(noEmit + allowImportingTsExtensions\)
- Converted types to camelCase for API response consistency
- Added vitest setup with Chrome API mocks
- Expanded extension tests from 3 to 8 \(including tab switching\)

Story: 1-1-project-scaffolding-monorepo-setup
Status: done

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
